snippet.title: A Musical Story Overview Trailer - Day of the Devs 2021
snippet.description:
Join Charles Bardin, game designer and co-composer at Glee-Cheese Studio, for a look at the story, vibrant world, gameplay, and more from the upcoming rhythm game, A Musical Story. 

The game is set against a 70s backdrop, and you will explore the memories of Gabriel, a young man trying to come to terms with his situation through the connections to his musical memory. Each correctly played melody opens a new chapter into Gabriel's past, bringing him closer to the truth. 

A Musical Story arrives in October 2021 for PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox, and iOS.

#GameTrailers #SummerOfGaming #Gaming
